name: BA:BEET
description:
Sacrifice your baby beet to the great Evil.

Make it worthy of the dark lord by feeding it demonic spirits.

Let the music guide your every move.

Don't drop the beet!

Testimonials 

"Nice bit of beet. Beep beep." - Kotaku

"We dig it." - The church of Satan

"It looks like a colon. Fred should not play this." - Fred's mom

Winner of the Industry Award in CreateJam - Fall 2018 (given theme : "spooky baby cultist").

Controls

Left hand : WASD or Left Joystick.

Right hand : Arrow keys or Right Joystick.

Two players may should control one hand each.

Credits
  • Lasse Westmark - 3D artist
  • Hugo Hallé - 2D artist
  • Andreas Thomsen - Game Designer/Programmer
  • Jon Aschberg - Programmer
  • Jarl Hyttel - Music
